src:
Posledice nesreče na vzhodni ljubljanski obvoznici med razcepom Malence in Bizovikom proti Zadobrovi so odstranili

05 Nov 2019, 17:45


Ljubljana, 5. novembra - Na vzhodni ljubljanski obvoznici med razcepom Malence in Bizovikom proti Zadobrovi so odstranili posledice prometne nesreče. Po podatkih prometnoinformacisjkega centra pa še ostaja zastoj.



Lukovica. Prometna nesreča, znak stop.Foto: Nebojša Tejić/STA Arhiv STA
text:
The consequences of the accident on the east Ljubljana bypass between the Malence split and Bizovik towards Zadobrova were eliminated

05 Nov 2019, 16:45


Ljubljana, 5 November - The consequences of a car accident were eliminated on the east Ljubljana bypass between the Malence and Bizovik split towards Zadobrova. According to the Traffic Information Center, however, there is still a deadlock.



The bulb. Traffic accident, stop sign. Photo: Nebojsa Tejic / STA
